sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves vendors details from SAP S4 HANA RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S4 HANA - RFC.
  • Initial Load - Defines whether the action request is for full load or delta load.
  • Row Skip - Specifies the rows that should be skipped and retrieves the next set of output rows based on row count. Default value is zero.
  • Row Count - Number of rows to be retrieved from the table.
  • Company Code Criteria - Objects containing these fields:
    • Inclusive/exclusive [ SIGN ]
    • Selection operator [ OPTION ]
    • From Company Code [ LOW ]
    • To Company Code [ HIGH ]
  • Load Complete - Specifies whether the delta load or full load can be defined as complete.

Outputs :

  • Vendors - Array of objects containing these fields:
    • Bank Details - Objects containing these fields: 
      • Bank Control Key
      • Bank Account
      • Bank Name
      • Bank Key
      • Bank Country
      • Vendor [ LIFNR ]
      • Collection Authorization
      • Reference Details
      • Valid from
      • Valid to
      • Account Holder
      • Part Bank Type
      • International Bank Country Key
      • International Bank Key
      • SWIFT/BIC for International Payments
      • International Bank Account Number
    • Suppliers - Objects containing these fields:
      • Centrally Imposed Purchasing Block
      • Sort Field
      • Forwarding Agent Freight Group
      • Key for the Sex of the Person Subject to Withholding Tax
      • Scheduling Procedure
      • Standard Carrier Access Code
      • RNE Issuing Date
      • Foreign National Registration
      • RIC Number
      • RG Issuing Date
      • RG Number
      • Last Review
      • Registered for Social Insurance
      • Region (State, Provenance, Country)
      • Validity Date of Certification
      • Vendors QM System
      • Postal Code
      • P.O. Box Postal Code
      • First Name
      • Title
      • Street: No longer used from Release 4.6B
      • PSON1
      • PSON2
      • PSON3
      • Subledger Account Pre-processing Procedure
      • House Number: Is no longer used from Release 4.6B
      • Processor Group
      • Profession
      • Vendor is PPA relevant
      • Vendor Indicator Relevant for Proof of Delivery
      • Payment Office
      • Factory Calendar Key
      • PO Box City
      • PO Box
      • District [ ORT01 ]
      • District [ ORT02 ]
      • Central Deletion Block for Master Record
      • NAME1
      • NAME2
      • NAME3
      • NAME4
      • Micro Company Indicator
      • Search Term for Match Code Search [ MCOD1 ]
      • Search Term for Match Code Search [ MCOD2 ]
      • Search Term for Match Code Search [ MCOD3 ]
      • Client
      • Transportation Zone to or from which the Goods are Delivered
      • Indicator: Vendor Subrange Relevant
      • Deletion Flag for Master Record (Company Code Level)
      • Account Number of the Alternative Payee
      • Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
      • Uniform Resource Locator
      • Legal Nature
      • Country Key
      • Customer Number
      • Vendor Account Group
      • Reference Account Group for One-Time Account (Vendor)
      • Credit Information Number
      • Group Key
      • Currency
      • Capital Amount
      • Type of Industry
      • Type of Business
      • Name of Representative
      • Tax Split
      • Industry Main Type
      • ICMS Taxpayer
      • Place of Birth of the Person Subject to Withholding Tax
      • Date of Birth of the Person Subject to Withholding Tax
      • Tax Type
      • Account Number of Master Record of Tax Office Responsible
      • Account Number of the Master Record with Fiscal Address
      • Issued By
      • POR Subscriber Number
      • Created by
      • Created on
      • External Manufacturer Code Name or Number
      • Status of Data Transfer into Subsequent Release
      • Instruction Key for Data Medium Exchange
      • Report Key for Data Medium Exchange
      • Service Agent Procedure Group
      • Declaration Regimen for PIS/COFINS
      • Data Communication Line No.
      • Business Purpose Completed Flag
      • CRT Number
      • CRC Number
      • Status of Change Authorization (Company Code Level)
      • Company Size
      • CNAE
      • Carrier Confirmation is Expected
      • Check Digit for the International Location Number
      • Industry Key
      • Authorization Group
      • International Location Number [ Part 1 ]
      • International Location Number [ Part 2 ]
      • Train Station
      • Active Code for Social Insurance
      • Agency Location Code
      • Address
      • Title
      • Central Posting Block
      • Language Key
      • Tax Number 1
      • Tax Number 2
      • Tax Number 3
      • Tax Number 4
      • Tax Number 5
      • Indicator: Business Partner Subject to Equalization Tax?
      • Liable for VAT
      • Telebox Number
      • First Telephone Number
      • Second Telephone Number
      • Fax Number
      • Teletex Number
      • Telex Number
      • Indicator: Is the Account a One-Time Account?
      • Indicator: Alternative Payee in Document Allowed?
      • Company ID of Trading Partner
      • VAT Registration Number
      • Natural Person
      • Function that will be Blocked
      • Plant
      • Indicator: Plant Level Relevant
      • Tax Jurisdiction
      • Payment Block
      • Indicator: Alternative Payee Using Account Number
      • Tax Number Type
      • Tax Base in Percentage
      • Shipment: Statistics Group, Transportation Service Agent
      • Time of Last Change Confirmation
      • Tax Number at Responsible Tax Authority
      • Terms of Liability
      • State
      • Tax Declaration Type
      • Subcontractor Information
      • US Federal Government Vendor Master Data Additional Fields
      • Transportation Chain
      • Staging Time in Days
      • Cross Docking: Relevant for Collective Numbering
      • Account Number of the Alternative Payee
      • Street and House Number
    • Partner Functions - Objects containing these fields:
      • Default Partner Information
      • Purchasing Organization
      • Created on
      • Created by
      • Vendor Information
      • Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
      • Vendor Subrange Information
      • Client
      • Number of Contact Person Information
      • Partner Function Information
      • Partner Counter Information
      • Personnel Number
      • Plant
    • Company Codes - Objects containing these fields:
      • E-Mail Address for Avis: Hash Value
      • Reconciliation Account in General Ledger
      • Previous Master Record Number
      • Assignment Test Group
      • Indicator: Send Payment Advice by XML
      • Average Daily Basis Points for Purchase Cards
      • Authorization Group
      • Subsidy Indicator for Determining the Reduction Rates
      • Company Code
      • Accounting Clerk Abbreviation
      • Certification Date
      • Main Economic Activity
      • Status of Change Authorization (Central)
      • Business Purpose Completed Flag
      • Date of the Last Interest Calculation Run
      • Our Account Number with the Vendor
      • Created on
      • Created by
      • Planning Group
      • Release Approval Group
      • Vendor in Execution
      • Activity Code for Gross Income Tax
      • Distribution Type for Employment Tax
      • Payment Terms Key for Credit Memos
      • Short Key for a House Bank
      • Internet Address of Partner Company Clerk
      • Completion Date of Inspection
      • Offset Method
      • Offset Percentage
      • Subcontractor Type
      • Probable Time Until Cheque is Paid
      • Memo
      • Vendor's Account Number
      • Account Number of The Alternative Payee
      • Head Office Account Number
      • Delete Flag for Vendor at Purchasing Level
      • Client
      • Key for Dunning Notice Grouping
      • Minority Indicators
      • Deletion Block for Master Record (Company Code Level)
      • Personnel Number
      • Withholding Tax Country Key
      • Authority for Exemption from Withholding Tax
      • Vendor Recipient Type
      • Future Withholding Tax Code
      • Validity Date for Withholding Tax Exemption Certificate
      • Certificate Number of the Withholding Tax Exemption
      • Check Flag for Double Invoices or Credit Memos
      • Central Posting Flag
      • Accounting Clerk Telephone Number at Business Partner
      • Accounting Clerk Fax Number at the Customer/Vendor
      • Tolerance Group: Invoice Verification
      • Tolerance Group for the Business Partner/G/L Account
      • Date on which the Changes were Confirmed
      • Time of Last Change Confirmation
      • Payment Method Supplement
      • Interest Calculation Indicator
      • Bill of Exchange Limit (In Local Currency)
      • Indicator for Periodic Account Statements
      • Indicator: Local Processing
      • Indicator: Send Payment Advices by EDI
      • Indicator: Alternative Payee Using Account Number
      • Indicator: Pay all Items Separately
      • Indicator: Clearing between Customer and Vendor
      • Block Key for Payment
      • Ledger Management Expiration Date
      • Key for Payment Grouping
      • Key Date of Last Interest Calculation
      • Interest Calculation Frequency in Months
      • Certification Date for Minimum Wage
      • Future Withholding Tax Code
      • Validity Date for Withholding Tax Exemption Certificate
      • Certificate Number of the Withholding Tax Exemption
      • Clerk at Vendor
      • Terms of Payment Key
      • Key for Sorting According to Assignment Numbers
      • List of Respected Payment Methods
      • Date of the Last Interest Calculation Run
      • Prepayment Relevance (Vendor)
    • Purchasing Organizations - Objects containing these fields:
      • Release Creation Profile
      • Activity Profile for PO Controlling
      • Indicator: Relevant for Agency Business
      • Indicator: Doc. Index Compilation Active for Purchase Orders
      • Indicator: Index Compilation for Subsequence Settlement Active
      • Indicator: Vendor Subject to Subsequence Settlement Accounting
      • Restriction Profile for PO-Based Load Building
      • Confirmation Control Key
      • Our Account Number with the Vendor
      • Purchasing Group
      • Purchasing Organization
      • Created on
      • Created by
      • Mode of Transport for Foreign Trade
      • Customer/Vendor ID
      • VAS Determination Mode
      • Incoterms [ Part 1 ]
      • Incoterms [ Part 2 ]
      • Incoterms Location 1
      • Incoterms Location 2
      • Incoterms Version
      • Group for Calculation Schema (Vendor)
      • Order Acknowledgment Requirement
      • Automatic Generation of Purchase Order Allowed
      • Indicates whether Vendor is Returns Vendor
      • Indicator for Service-Based Invoice Verification
      • ABC Indicator
      • Planning Cycle
      • Order Entry by Vendor
      • Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
      • Price Marking Vendor
      • Rack Jobbing Vendor
      • Central Deletion Flag for Master Record
      • Client
      • Unit of Measure Group
      • Price Determination Pricing Date Control
      • Minimum Order Value
      • Planning Calendar
      • Indicator whether Discount in Kind Granted
      • Profile for Transferring Material Data via IDoc PROACT
      • Planned Delivery in Time
      • Indicator: Relevance to Price Determination (Vendor)
      • Rounding Profile
      • Vendor Sort Criterion for Materials
      • Centrally Imposed Purchasing Block
      • Staging Time in Days
      • Vendor Telephone Number
      • Transportation Chain
      • Comparison/Agreement of Business Volumes Necessary
      • Vendor RMA Number Required
      • Vendor Service Level
      • Responsible Salesperson at Vendor's Office
      • Shipping Conditions
      • Purchase Order Currency
      • Indicator: GR-Based Invoice Verification
      • Purchasing Group
      • Revaluation Allowed
      • Customs Office: Office of Exit/Entry for Foreign Trade
      • Terms of Payment Key
      • Vendor Account Number
      • Order Acknowledgment Requirement
      • Automatic Evaluated Receipt Settlement for Return Items
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S4 HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • No or empty response received from SAP S4 HANA - RFC.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S4 HANA RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP S4 HANA RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves vendors details from SAP S4 HANA RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S4 HANA - RFC.
  • Initial Load - Defines whether the action request is for full load or delta load.
  • Row Skip - Specifies the rows that should be skipped and retrieves the next set of output rows based on row count. Default value is zero.
  • Row Count - Number of rows to be retrieved from the table.
  • Company Code Criteria - Objects containing these fields:
    • Inclusive/exclusive [ SIGN ]
    • Selection operator [ OPTION ]
    • From Company Code [ LOW ]
    • To Company Code [ HIGH ]
  • Load Complete - Specifies whether the delta load or full load can be defined as complete.

Outputs :

  • Vendors - Array of objects containing these fields:
    • Bank Details - Objects containing these fields: 
      • Bank Control Key
      • Bank Account
      • Bank Name
      • Bank Key
      • Bank Country
      • Vendor [ LIFNR ]
      • Collection Authorization
      • Reference Details
      • Valid from
      • Valid to
      • Account Holder
      • Part Bank Type
      • International Bank Country Key
      • International Bank Key
      • SWIFT/BIC for International Payments
      • International Bank Account Number
    • Suppliers - Objects containing these fields:
      • Centrally Imposed Purchasing Block
      • Sort Field
      • Forwarding Agent Freight Group
      • Key for the Sex of the Person Subject to Withholding Tax
      • Scheduling Procedure
      • Standard Carrier Access Code
      • RNE Issuing Date
      • Foreign National Registration
      • RIC Number
      • RG Issuing Date
      • RG Number
      • Last Review
      • Registered for Social Insurance
      • Region (State, Provenance, Country)
      • Validity Date of Certification
      • Vendors QM System
      • Postal Code
      • P.O. Box Postal Code
      • First Name
      • Title
      • Street: No longer used from Release 4.6B

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S4 HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • No or empty response received from SAP S4 HANA - RFC.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S4 HANA RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP S4 HANA RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
